Question: This person was the first non British person to command Gibraltar for 200 years.
Hints: This person was born on October 14, 1890, in Denison, Texas, the third of seven boys.
This person maintained no political party affiliation during this time, though he was clear in not aligning with the Democrats.
Accounts vary as to how and when the German name Eisenhauer was changed to a more American spelling of this person.
